prodNameC: 諾法鐵人類抗腮腺炎病毒免疫球蛋白M酵素免疫分析套組(未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc: Mumps Virus Coated Wells (IgM): 12 breakapart 8-well snap-off strips coated with MumpsVirus antigen. IgM Sample Diluent: 1 bottle containing 100 ml of buffer for sample dilution.Stop Solution: 1 bottle containing 15 ml sulphuric acid, 0.2 mol/l.Washing Solution (20x conc.): 1 bottle containing 50 ml of a 20-fold concentrated buffer. Mumps Virus anti-IgM Conjugate: 1 bottle containing 20 ml of a peroxidase labeled rabbit antibody to human IgM.TMB Substrate Solution: 1 bottle containing 15 ml TMB.Mumps Virus IgM Positive Control: 2ml/bottleMumps Virus IgM Cut-off Control: 2ml/bottleMumps Virus IgM Negative Control: 2ml/bottle
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區福德三路369號12樓
efficacy: 定性偵測人體血清中對抗腮腺炎病毒免疫球蛋白M類抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
